languages.text: "Ты проницател{mf|ен|ьна}. Мои предыдущие эксперименты не удались. Ты встречал{mf||а} некоторых из них, в частности, Фальта собственной персоной. Помнишь безумного мутанта у Фесмофориуса? С его мозгами вышла небольшая проблема". {n}Из-под маски раздается издевательский смех, от которого все тело скомороха содрогается.{/n} "Но ты не переживай. В этот раз все получится".
languages.translation_comment: в это время Глейто продвигается немного вперед

traits.locale_text: "Ты проницател{mf|ен|ьна}. Мои предыдущие эксперименты не удались. Ты встречал{mf||а} некоторых из них, в частности, Фальта собственной персоной. Помнишь безумного мутанта у Фесмофориуса? С его мозгами вышла небольшая проблема". {n}Из-под маски раздается издевательский смех, от которого все тело скомороха содрогается.{/n} "Но ты не переживай. В этот раз все получится".
traits.speaker: FW_TrueGovernor_Buffoon

languages.translation_comment: в это время Глейто продвигается немного вперед

languages.text: "You are perceptive, aren't you? My previous experiments were failures. You have met some of them, actually, including Falt himself. Remember the crazy mutant by the Phesmophorius? His brains turned out to be a bit of a complication." {n}Mocking laughter erupts from behind the mask, making the fool's body shake all over.{/n} "But do not fret. This time, it will work."
languages.original_text: "Ты проницател{mf|ен|ьна}. Мои предыдущие эксперименты не удались. Ты встречал{mf||а} некоторых из них, в частности, Фальта собственной персоной. Помнишь безумного мутанта у Фесмофориуса? С его мозгами вышла небольшая проблема". {n}Из-под маски раздается издевательский смех, от которого все тело скомороха содрогается.{/n} "Но ты не переживай. В этот раз все получится".

traits.locale_text: "You are perceptive. My previous experiments were failures. You have met some of them, particularly Falt himself. Remember the crazy mutant by the Phesmophorius? His brains turned out to be a slight complication." {n}Mocking laughter erupts beneath the mask, making the fool's body shake all over.{/n} "But do not fret. This time it will work."

"You are perceptive, aren't you? My previous experiments were failures. You have met some of them, actually, including Falt himself. Remember the crazy mutant by the Phesmophorius? His brains turned out to be a bit of a complication." {n}Mocking laughter erupts from behind the mask, making the fool's body shake all over.{/n} "But do not fret. This time, it will work."

"You are perceptive. My previous experiments were failures. You have met some of them, particularly Falt himself. Remember the crazy mutant in Phesmophorius? Oh, you should have seen your face!" {n}Mocking laughter erupts beneath the mask, making the fool's body shake all over.{/n} "And you will. This time it will work."

His brains turned out to be a slight complication." {n}Mocking laughter erupts beneath the mask, making the fool's body shake all over.{/n} "But do not fret. This time it will work."

"You are perceptive, aren't you? My previous experiments were failures. You have met some of them, actually, including Falt himself. Remember the crazy mutant by the Phesmophorius? His brains turned out to be a bit of a complication." {n}Mocking laughter erupts from behind the mask, making the fool's body shake all over.{/n} "But do not fret. This time, it will work."

languages.text: “你确实很有洞见，不是吗？我之前的实验都失败了，其中一部分人你也见过了，比如法尔特本人。你还记得菲斯摩弗瑞斯旁边，那个发了疯的变种人吧？没想到，他的脑子还真是有点复杂。”{n}面具后面爆发出了嘲弄的笑声，小丑浑身剧烈地颤抖着。{/n}“不过，不用担心，这次一定能成功。”
languages.original_text: "You are perceptive, aren't you? My previous experiments were failures. You have met some of them, actually, including Falt himself. Remember the crazy mutant by the Phesmophorius? His brains turned out to be a bit of a complication." {n}Mocking laughter erupts from behind the mask, making the fool's body shake all over.{/n} "But do not fret. This time, it will work."

traits.locale_text: “你确实很有洞见，不是吗？我之前的实验都失败了，其中一部分人你也见过了，比如法尔特本人。你还记得菲斯摩弗瑞斯旁边，那个发了疯的变种人吧？没想到，他的脑子还真是有点复杂。”{n}面具后面爆发出了嘲弄的笑声，小丑浑身剧烈地颤抖着。{/n}“不过，不用担心，这次一定能成功。”

languages.text: «Qué perspicacia la suya. Mis anteriores experimentos fracasaron. De hecho ya se ha topado con alguno, incluido el propio Falt. ¿Se acuerda de aquel mutante desquiciado del fesmoforio? Su mente resultó ser un obstáculo». {n}El enmascarado bufón profiere una risotada burlona que sacude todo su cuerpo.{/n} «Pero no tema. Esta vez no pienso fallar».
languages.original_text: "You are perceptive, aren't you? My previous experiments were failures. You have met some of them, actually, including Falt himself. Remember the crazy mutant by the Phesmophorius? His brains turned out to be a bit of a complication." {n}Mocking laughter erupts from behind the mask, making the fool's body shake all over.{/n} "But do not fret. This time, it will work."

traits.locale_text: «Qué perspicacia la suya. Mis anteriores experimentos fracasaron. De hecho ya se ha topado con alguno, incluido el propio Falt. ¿Se acuerda de aquel mutante desquiciado del fesmoforio? Su mente resultó ser un obstáculo». {n}El enmascarado bufón profiere una risotada burlona que sacude todo su cuerpo.{/n} «Pero no tema. Esta vez no pienso fallar».

languages.text: "Anlayışlısın, öyle değil mi?. Önceki deneylerim başarısız oldu. Aslında Falt'ın kendisi de dâhil olmak üzere bazılarıyla tanıştın. Pesmoforyus'un yanındaki çılgın mutantı hatırlıyor musun? Beyninde bir komplikasyon olduğu ortaya çıktı." {n}Maskenin altından alaycı kahkahalar patlatan soytarının tüm vücudu sarsılıyor.{/n} "Endişelenme. Bu sefer işe yarayacak."
languages.original_text: "You are perceptive, aren't you? My previous experiments were failures. You have met some of them, actually, including Falt himself. Remember the crazy mutant by the Phesmophorius? His brains turned out to be a bit of a complication." {n}Mocking laughter erupts from behind the mask, making the fool's body shake all over.{/n} "But do not fret. This time, it will work."

traits.locale_text: "Anlayışlısın, öyle değil mi?. Önceki deneylerim başarısız oldu. Aslında Falt'ın kendisi de dâhil olmak üzere bazılarıyla tanıştın. Pesmoforyus'un yanındaki çılgın mutantı hatırlıyor musun? Beyninde bir komplikasyon olduğu ortaya çıktı." {n}Maskenin altından alaycı kahkahalar patlatan soytarının tüm vücudu sarsılıyor.{/n} "Endişelenme. Bu sefer işe yarayacak."

languages.text: 「察しがいいな。過去の実験は失敗だった。お前は、その失敗例に会ったことがあるよ、特にフォルト自身にな。フェスモフォリウスのそばでのイカれた変異体を覚えているか？あぁ、お前は自分の顔を見るべきだった！」{n}嘲るような笑いが仮面の下から起こり、道化は体全体を震わせる。{/n}「そしてお前も。今回はうまくいくだろう」
languages.original_text: "You are perceptive. My previous experiments were failures. You have met some of them, particularly Falt himself. Remember the crazy mutant by the Phesmophorius? Oh, you should have seen your face!" {n}Mocking laughter erupts beneath the mask, making the fool's body shake all over.{/n} "And you will. This time it will work."

traits.locale_text: 「察しがいいな。過去の実験は失敗だった。お前は、その失敗例に会ったことがあるよ、特にフォルト自身にな。フェスモフォリウスのそばでのイカれた変異体を覚えているか？あぁ、お前は自分の顔を見るべきだった！」{n}嘲るような笑いが仮面の下から起こり、道化は体全体を震わせる。{/n}「そしてお前も。今回はうまくいくだろう」

languages.text: « Vous êtes très perspicace. Mes expériences précédentes n'ont pas eu le résultat escompté. Vous en avez d'ailleurs déjà rencontré quelques-unes, dont Falt en personne. Vous vous souvenez du mutant déchaîné près du Phesmophorius ? Sa cervelle nous a donné bien du souci. » {n}Le bouffon est agité de spasmes incontrôlables alors qu'il éclate d'un rire moqueur derrière son masque.{/n} « Mais ne vous inquiétez pas ! Cette fois, ça va fonctionner. »
languages.original_text: "You are perceptive, aren't you? My previous experiments were failures. You have met some of them, actually, including Falt himself. Remember the crazy mutant by the Phesmophorius? His brains turned out to be a bit of a complication." {n}Mocking laughter erupts from behind the mask, making the fool's body shake all over.{/n} "But do not fret. This time, it will work."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes très perspicace. Mes expériences précédentes n'ont pas eu le résultat escompté. Vous en avez d'ailleurs déjà rencontré quelques-unes, dont Falt en personne. Vous vous souvenez du mutant déchaîné près du Phesmophorius ? Sa cervelle nous a donné bien du souci. » {n}Le bouffon est agité de spasmes incontrôlables alors qu'il éclate d'un rire moqueur derrière son masque.{/n} « Mais ne vous inquiétez pas ! Cette fois, ça va fonctionner. »

languages.text: "Ihr seid recht scharfsinnig, was? Meine früheren Experimente waren Fehlschläge. Ihr seid sogar schon einigen von ihnen begegnet, unter anderem Falt selbst. Erinnert Ihr Euch an den verrückten Mutanten beim Phesmophorius? Sein Verstand hat sich als kleine Komplikation erwiesen." {n}Das spöttische Lachen hinter der Maske lässt den Narren am ganzen Körper zittern.{/n} "Aber seid unbesorgt. Dieses Mal wird es funktionieren."
languages.original_text: "You are perceptive, aren't you? My previous experiments were failures. You have met some of them, actually, including Falt himself. Remember the crazy mutant by the Phesmophorius? His brains turned out to be a bit of a complication." {n}Mocking laughter erupts from behind the mask, making the fool's body shake all over.{/n} "But do not fret. This time, it will work."
